name: flaunt
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to show or make obvious something you are proud of in order to get admiration

example.eg: He's got a lot of money but he doesn't flaunt it.
example.egtrans: 他有很多钱，但从不炫耀。

example.eg: Flavio was flaunting his tan in a pair of white trunks.
example.egtrans: 弗拉维奥穿了一条白色的游泳裤，炫耀自己晒成棕褐色的肌肤。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to show your body in a confident and sexual manner
